column5: Would anybody know what time the bait shop, on the corner, in Vermillion Bay opens each morning? Also just curious if anyone knows what leach prices are at this year? Doesn't much matter, because we need to buy them, just curious.

I paid a terrible price of $47 a pound in Ear Falls first week of June. We had a person in camp tell us that walleye were doing well on leeches. We had better luck on crawlers. The guy must have been part owner in the bait shop.

Thanks for listing the phone number. Found out they open at 5:00 on Saturdays and a lb. of leeches is $40.00. Should be on the water heading to the outpost in McKenzie Bay at this time tomorrow! Can't wait!!!
